original_text: and he will reign over the house of Jacob forever, and of his kingdom there will be no end.”
korean_text: 영원히 야곱의 집을 왕으로 다스리실 것이며 그 나라가 무궁하리라

sentences.original_text: and he will reign over the house of Jacob forever
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 야곱의 집을 영원히 다스릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and of his kingdom there will be no end.”
